name: Anti-region-legion.github.io
tagline: Home page of the anti-#region legion
body:
The Anti-`#region` Legion ========================= The idea for the anti-`#region` legion started from a [twitter conversation](https://twitter.com/jrusbatch/status/392473615557746688) which again was started from [Microsoft declining to remove `#regions` from c#](https://visualstudio.uservoice.com/forums/121579-visual-studio/suggestions/2678342-region-directive-considered-harmful-was-get-rid). If you think `#regions` are evil and you would like to join the anti-`#region` Legion then just follow the this github repo (just to indicate interest). Or get a T-shirt:

@blowdart Sure, here you go. http://t.co/K4hshy6o4Q

— Justin Rusbatch (@jrusbatch) October 22, 2013

Starting C# debates today. Use OOP, not hiding 500 line methods. #endregions (thanks for the shirt, @blowdart) pic.twitter.com/lu9vPv6pHH

— Matt Kerr (@kunikos) November 7, 2013
**Join the anti-`#region` Legion today!**
